# Unity folders to ignore
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/
UserSettings/

# Visual Studio / JetBrains Rider
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Crash logs
*.stacktrace

# Builds
*.apk
*.aab
*.exe
*.app
*.zip

# Auto-generated VS Code settings (optional)
.vscode/
